description:
The Leonidas II was the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] flagship of the http://anidb.net/ch96433 [11th Fleet] under Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch800 [Luglanju]. It succeeded the Epimetheus as the flagship of the 11th Fleet after it was destroyed at the Third Battle of Tiamat.
Vice Admiral Legrange and the rest of the 11th Fleet sided with the http://anidb.net/ch6225 [National Salvation Military Council] in the Alliance Civil War, and sortied from Heinessen to intercept and destroy the http://anidb.net/ch96406 [Yang Fleet]. When the Yang Fleet engaged the 11th Fleet at the Battle of Doria Starzone, the 11th Fleet was annihilated, and the Leonidas II was reduced to a twisted wreck.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Leonidas II
